application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 - Sycamore - Crown Lift to provide 7 metres clearance from ground level to be carefully lowered over adjacent boats	2 - Holly and Hazel clump - Coppice Hazels and reduce Holly to approx 1.75 metres tall - Pre works 3.5 metres down to 1.75 metres tall3 - Cherry - Carefully remove stem over building (1 of 3) - Single limb of three to be removed approx 3m long Pre works 14m x 9m to 14m x 6m4 - Hazel clump - Coppice to ground level5 - Crack Willow growing into neighbours	Carefully climb and dismantle to as close to ground level as possible 6 - Yew x 3 - Crown Lift to provide 3 metres clearance from ground level (exact amount to be clarified on day of works with client)	7 - Common Horse Chestnut x 2 - Carefully climb and dismantle to as close to ground level as possible 	8 - Sycamore - Carefully climb and dismantle to as close to ground level as possible 	9 - Holly clump - Reduce to approx 5m tall	from 10m tallAll works are to tidy overgrown areas as new owners are relandscaping and looking to plant more trees and allow light to property.
